name: Solitaire Simple free
description:
Simple Solitaire game also known as Klondike or Patience card game with BIG EASY to READ CARDS. YOU WILL LOVE THIS APP! Solitaire is the best single player card game out there to pass the time.

If you like playing solitaire, this is the app for you!

Popular features of Solitaire include:

- Big Letters: Easy to Read Cards

- Fast Gameplay: Single tap card to place automatically

- Customise: Set Card Style, back of card and background from your own pictures!

- Stress free: No time counter, relax and just play.

- Gamecenter: See how you score against other and your friends

- Free play: Unlimited free games

- Undo move: No penalty undo

- Autocomplete: Finish the game for you.


If you enjoy playing card games and not always have cards handy and have some free time download this free solitaire app now and see for yourself why so many others love it.
